overview: Join Mickey, Toodles and the gang for this magical full-length adventure you'll enjoy year-round! Ride the amazing Clubhouse Train to the top of the mountain, and help load the train cars full of incredible, never-melting, "Easy-Freezy" snow! Share in the excitement when you arrive back at the Clubhouse to ski and make snow angels...in summer! Hop back on board and race to each station to pick up guests in time for the coolest snow party ever! It's always the season of fun when you ride on Mickey's CHOO-CHOO EXPRESS!
title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse: Choo-Choo Express
